name: Astral Devourer
description: The Astral Devourer is a formidable medium aberration embodying chaos and evil, featuring serpentine forms and possessing natural armor for protection. It has a menacing appearance that reflects its aggressive nature.
memorable: It can split into smaller versions of itself when injured, maintaining a hive mind connection while also coordinating with its serpentine forms to enhance tactical options.
goals: To disrupt and damage enemies through coordinated physical and poison attacks.
relations: Tends to occupy areas of chaos alongside other aberrations or forms of similar chaotic entities.
environment: Usually found in chaotic or alien environments, possibly in places where the astral plane overlaps with the material world.
strengths: Possesses damage immunities to poison and psychic damage, along with resistances to nonmagical attacks, making it very resilient in combat.
weaknesses: Requires proximity to its swarm for optimal functioning, which can be a tactical limitation in certain combat scenarios.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack action with melee attacks that involve piercing damage and poisonous effects, as well as a ground-splashing serpent spray attack.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to split into smaller Astral Devourers when taking damage, allowing it to multiply and adapt to challenges in combat.
senses: Has keen perception with a passive score of 16, indicating strong awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Exhibits exceptional stealth and perception skills, enabling it to avoid detection and effectively sense its environment.
additional_information: Can telepathically communicate with its individual serpents within 1 mile due to its Collective Mind ability.
Exhibits Magic Resistance, gaining advantages on saving throws against spells.
Can occupy another creature's space through its Swarm ability.
Recovers hit points by utilizing its Serpent Spray attack which damages multiple targets.
Immunities to conditions like being grappled, paralyzed, or stunned.
